org.jacp.api.componentLayout
Interface IWorkbenchLayout<C>

Type Parameters:
C - defines the base component where others extend from
All Superinterfaces:
IBaseLayout<C>
public interface IWorkbenchLayout<C>
extends IBaseLayout<C>

Defines the base layout of a workbench and the application.

Author:
Andy Moncsek
